Suggestions.Text: Turn off Secure Core. It can sometimes slow down your connection.
Try a different server. Servers in nearby countries often have faster connection speeds.

Suggestions.Text: Try a different PLUS server. Just so you know, streaming is only available on a PLUS subscription.
Clear your cache. You can do this in your browser settings.
Turn off any ad blockers or proxies. If you use NetShield, set it to “don’t block”.
